des: "This is a hot, creamy dip that may also be served as a casserole by halving the amount of Bechamel sauce and topping with Parmesan (instead of adding Parmesan to the mixture). Then bake in a medium baking dish for approximately 30 minutes at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) -- Delicious!"
ins:
In a large saucepan, melt together the Bechamel sauce, cream cheese, cayenne pepper, salt, onion, Parmesan cheese, and Cheddar cheese. Stir in the spinach.
Transfer the mixture to a slow cooker and keep warm over medium heat.
